naslov: Okrug Donji, velika apartmanska kuća s pogledom na more, 591 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Dvojna apartmanska kuća u Okrugu Donjem, bruto stambene površine od 591.05 m2. Proteže se na pet punih etaža i dobro opremljena. U suterenu se nalazi prostran apartman sa spavaćom sobom, blagovaona/dnevni boravak, kuhinja, WC i kupaonica te kotlovnica. Vani je vrtna terasa, stol i stolice s roštiljom na strani prema moru i garaža prema cestovnoj strani. Prizemlje također odlikuje vrlo prostran apartman s dvije spavaće sobe, blagovaona/dnevni boravak, kuhinja, WC i kupaonica. Ima i izlaze s dvije strane na natkrivene terase. Prvi i drugi kat čine po dva apartmana. Jedan se sastoji od kuhinje/blagovaone, spavaće sobe i kupaonice, s izlazom na natkrivenu terasu. Drugi apartman čine dvije spavaće sobe, kuhinja/blagovaona te kupaonica, isto s izlazom na svoju natkrivenu terasu. Treći kat se sastoji od jednog vrlo prostranog apartmana s dvije spavaće sobe, kuhinjom, blagovaonom/dnevnim boravkom, WC-om, kupaonicom i dva izlaza na nenatkrivene terase. Kuća, uz klima uređaje, posjeduje i sustav centralnog grijanja skupa sa solarnim kolektorom i velikim bojlerima, te dodatnim bojlerima za svaku etažu. Pokraj kuće se nalazi i dodatna prostrana popločena terasa s pogledom na more te tri parkirna mjesta. Odmah preko puta ceste je i dodatna zemljišna čestica s još tri parkirna mjesta. Sve etaže ponad prizemlja odlikuje i prekrasan pogled na more. Svi važni sadržaji se nalaze u blizini s odličnom prometnom povezanošću. Nekretnina dolazi potpuno namještena i s uhodanim poslom turističkog iznajmljivanja. --- Semi-detached apartment house in Okrug Donji, gross living area of ​​591.05 m2. It spreads over five full floors and is well equipped. In the basement there is a spacious apartment with a bedroom, dining / living room, kitchen, toilet and bathroom and boiler room. Outside is a garden terrace, table and chairs with barbecue on the sea side and a garage on the road side. The ground floor also features a very spacious apartment with two bedrooms, dining / living room, kitchen, toilet and bathroom. It also has exits on two sides to the covered terraces. The first and second floor consist of two apartments. One consists of a kitchen / dining room, a bedroom and a bathroom, with access to a covered terrace. The second apartment consists of two bedrooms, kitchen / dining room and bathroom, also with access to its covered terrace. The third floor consists of one very spacious apartment with two bedrooms, kitchen, dining / living room, toilet, bathroom and two exits to the uncovered terraces. The house, in addition to air conditioning, has a central heating system along with a solar collector and large water heaters, and additional water heaters for each floor. Next to the house there is an additional spacious paved terrace overlooking several and three parking spaces. Just across the road is an additional plot of land with three more parking spaces. All floors above the ground floor are characterized by beautiful sea views. All important facilities are located nearby with excellent transport links. The property comes fully furnished and with a well-established tourist rental business.
